SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Governance
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Digital Government and Transparency.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We integrate strategies to improve and optimize the processes of public administration and government, in addition to promoting the principles of openness and transparency to bring governments, citizens and companies closer together based on Information and Communication Technologies.

AREA1.TITLE: Participation and inclusion
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Design of a citizen participation plan for decision-making, project development and public policies

AREA1.TITLE: Public and social services
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Integration and interconnection of services with access through comprehensive platforms

AREA1.TITLE: Transparency and accessibility to information
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Development of tools for representation and access to information

AREA2.TITLE: Efficiency in global management
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Implementation of information and communication technologies in governments to identify problems and build solutions attached to real scenarios

AREA2.TITLE: Multi-Level Governance
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Organization of functional areas, facilitate the creation of financing programs, regulatory implementation and formation of networks that group demand and allow the introduction of innovative services

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Economy
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Financing and Business Models.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We generate development plans that encourage the spirit of innovation, creative ability and the capacity for change and transformation.

AREA1.TITLE: Innovation
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Generation of measures for the promotion and cooperation between administration, companies and education

AREA1.TITLE: Productivity
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Generation of physical and technological infrastructures to optimize productivity

AREA1.TITLE: Interconnectivity
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Generation of business networks and strategies to achieve an internet presence

AREA2.TITLE: Flexibility of the labor market
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Creation of measures to improve labor conditions such as combating unemployment, improving access to the labor market and developing technological proposals

AREA2.TITLE: Entrepreneurship and Start-Ups
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Education, training and creation of environments and infrastructures focused on business support

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Mobility and
Infrastructure
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Mobility and Connected Infrastructure.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We manage sustainable transport systems, respectful of the environment and with effective energy expenditure, using ICTs to monitor and provide a more appropriate service to different users.

AREA1.TITLE: Accessibility
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Strategies for improving physical, digital, socioeconomic and cultural accessibility

AREA1.TITLE: Clean and Non-motorized options
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Promote sustainable alternatives such as non-motorized and ecological transport.

AREA2.TITLE: Traffic management, public transport, logistics and ICTs
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Optimize traffic flow and public transport through information and communication technologies.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Environment
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Sustainability and ESG Services.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: orientation in the development and implementation of clean energies and the efficient use of water and management of waste, based on the correct management of projects and sustainable use of natural resources.

AREA1.TITLE: Environmental monitoring and distribution networks
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Supervision of environmental conditions and the state of distribution networks.

AREA1.TITLE: Energy efficiency
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Optimization of energy consumption to reduce costs and emissions.

AREA1.TITLE: Urban planning and building rehabilitation
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Design and improvement of urban spaces and recovery of existing infrastructure.

AREA2.TITLE: Waste management
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive waste management to minimize environmental impact.

AREA2.TITLE: Environmental protection
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Actions to preserve ecosystems and natural resources.

AREA2.TITLE: Awareness and change of habits
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Promotion of sustainable practices and environmental education in society.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Habitat and
Services
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Security and Quality of Life.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We promote and guide in the creation of networks and infrastructures that allow participation in areas such as e-health, e-culture, e-tourism and e-security.

AREA1.TITLE: Tourism
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Generation of integrated platforms for the presentation and provision of tourist services.

AREA1.TITLE: Culture and leisure
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Promotion of cultural and recreational activities through digital solutions.

AREA1.TITLE: Health and care
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Application of technologies to improve medical care and well-being.

AREA1.TITLE: Management of public space
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Optimization of the administration and use of urban areas.

AREA2.TITLE: Security
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Implementation of e-security systems to protect citizens.

AREA2.TITLE: Technological accessibility
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Facilitate access to digital tools for all social sectors.

AREA2.TITLE: Well-being and social inclusion
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Promotion of social integration and improvement of the quality of life.

SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.TITLE:
Smart
Society
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.SUBTITLE: Society and Digital Inclusion.
SMART_ECOSYSTEM_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: We guide in the structuring and administration of the project, we manage associations and financing and we design efficient infrastructures and public services.

AREA1.TITLE: Creativity
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Promotion of skills, art and culture, and generation of opportunities based on these.

AREA1.TITLE: Inclusive society
AREA1.DESCRIPTION: Inclusion in policies and measures, as well as generation of measures to support society.

AREA2.TITLE: Management of urban life and community creation
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Support for the creation of urban networks and platforms of community-based organizations and dissemination.

AREA2.TITLE: Digital education
AREA2.DESCRIPTION: Platforms for remote access to education, generation of facilities for lifelong learning and integration of technological solutions.

ABOUT.LABEL: Smart City.
ABOUT.TEXT1: A holistic system where human and social capital interact, using solutions based on ICTs.
ABOUT.TITLE2: The purpose of a Smart City is to achieve efficient management
ABOUT.TEXT2: satisfying the needs of the city and its citizens.
ABOUT.TITLE3: Consulting and advice on smart city management
ABOUT.TEXT3: National and international services with an ethical, sustainable and innovative approach.

CONTACT_FORM.HEADING: Contact us if you have questions or comments on the subject, or register to receive more information about smart cities.

INFORMATION.MISSION_TEXT: To devise intelligent solutions for the technological and sustainable development of cities and communities, always seeking the inclusion and accessibility of people.
INFORMATION.VISION_TEXT: To develop and create city and human settlement projects worldwide, which promote inclusiveness and guarantee accessibility, security, resource optimization, affordability and sustainability to achieve prosperity and quality of life.
